sentence: Atlanta Journal-Constitution: Trump brings his anti-Kemp campaign to Georgia Former President Donald Trump escalated his grudge Saturday against Brian Kemp at a rally in northeast Georgia, urging supporters to oust the incumbent he once endorsed and purge state government of many of the governors allies.
